lines:
MAIL DEPOSIT 
State National Bank of Boston

Herewith please f

or

CHECKSON

na labad, Tuma lut 
Prired- de winkel

thing. Chris

800 60

NO OTHER LETTER 19 NEEDED

THIS IS PRINTED IN CORSING IN

The NAMES of Boston Banks, or the PLACES on whicb Other 
checks are draw, should be noted against each item

The receipt of this letter will be acknowledged by retura mail.
